name: Fantasticfour
body:
### Welcome to TheFantasticFour's Homepage.
The name says it all.

### Our Project
Right now we are in the beginning stages of developing an unofficial Android Application for a popular local pizza chain, Gary's.

### Features (November 20th)
- View Contact Page
- Add Pizza with different sizes and toppings
- Add Pop with different sizes and types
- View and edit current list of items ordered
- Enter delivery address, phone number, e-mail and payment method
- View an order total including initial price, taxes, discounts and final price

### Authors and Contributors
Preston Hardy - Project Leader

Runbo Xu - Project Programming Specialist

Phil Nowak - Project Requirements and Artifacts Specialist

Wiley Radomski - Project Data Specialist

### Support or Contact

pghardy@csbsju.edu (Preston Hardy)

https://github.com/organizations/TheFantasticFour
